name: Moonwalk Cowboy
description:
Simple action game about duel between two cowboys with a little twist in gameplay.

Game supports players with disabilities. You can operate the game with only one button as well as with eye-tracking technology.

Created on PGG JAM - ALL PLAY: ACCESSIBILITY by:

- Marcin Lewandowicz - programmer

- Tomasz Depczyński - designer and composer

- Kamil Masłowski - characters artist

- Mateusz Jankowiak - UI and backgrounds artist
